Class Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.eclipse.core.commands.Commands

  • public final class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility methods pertaining to Eclipse commands.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandService

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.commands.ICommandService getCommandService()
        Gets the command service.
        Returns:
        the command service or null if the workbench has not been created yet

      • getCommandService

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.commands.ICommandService getCommandService(@Nullable
                                                        org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbench workbench)
        Gets the command service.
        Parameters:
        workbench - the workbench, may be null
        Returns:
        the command service or null if the workbench is null or if the workbench has no command service

      • waitForCommandService

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.commands.ICommandService waitForCommandService()
        Waits for the command service. This method blocks until there is an available command service.
        See Also:
        getCommandService()

      • waitForCommandService

        public static final org.eclipse.ui.commands.ICommandService waitForCommandService(org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbench workbench)
        Waits for the command service. This method blocks until there is an available command service.
        Parameters:
        workbench - the workbench, can not be null
        See Also:
        getCommandService(IWorkbench)
